name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos with Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds of large fresh shrimp 1/2 medium-‐sized red bell pepper, diced
1/3 cup of olive oil 1/4 cup of chopped fresh cilantro
4 Tlb. of lime juice, divided 2 garlic cloves, minced
3/4 tsp of ground cumin 2 Tlb. finely diced red onion
1/4 tsp of salt 1/2 tsp dried crushed red pepper
1 20 oz. can of crushed pineapple 6 (﴾8inch)﴿ flour tortillas, warmed
steps: Whisk together oil, 3 Tlb. of lime juice, cumin, and salt in shallow dish. Add shrimp. (﴾Can also be put in large ziploc
bag)﴿ cover and chill for 30 minutes.
Drain pineapple, reserving 1/4 cup of juice in large bowl. Add remaining 1 Tlb of lime juice, crushed pineapple, bell
pepper, cilantro, garlic, red onion, and red pepper. Toss gently. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
Remove shrimp from marinade, discard marinade.
Grill shrimp; covered with grill lid, over medium-‐high heat 2-‐3 minutes on each side or just until shrimp turn pink.
Serve shrimp in warm tortillas with pineapple salsa and any other topping you would like.
